scripts.load:k6:rps: BASE_URL=${BASE_URL:-http://localhost:3000} SCENARIO=rps RATE=${RATE:-20} TARGET=${TARGET:-participant} k6 run load-test.js
scripts.load:k6:docker:ramp: docker run --rm -e BASE_URL -e SCENARIO=ramp -e TARGET -v $PWD:/scripts grafana/k6 run /scripts/load-test.js
scripts.load:k6:docker:rps: docker run --rm -e BASE_URL -e SCENARIO=rps -e RATE -e TARGET -v $PWD:/scripts grafana/k6 run /scripts/load-test.js
